title: READING Presents beginning exercises in reading with COMPREHENSION understanding: Introductory concepts and work with SKILLS 1 Cause and Effect, Similarities and Differences, Grades 1-3 Predicting Outcomes, Main Ideas, and more

READING Provides continuing work in reading comprehension COMPREHENSION with an emphasis on application of concepts and skills SKILLS 2 in uses of Analogy, Comparison and Contrast, Fact and Grades 4-6 Opinion, Sequence of Events, etc
READING Develops more advanced skills in reading with COMPREHENSION understanding, emphasizing the integration and SKILLS 3 application of learning materials
